comments.body:
Can we just write `given qtp as quoted.Type[T] = ...`? No, we cannot, as we require a stable prefix.

This use case seems to suggest the current design of `given` does not work well with rest of the language.
That is the case. But Types are usually given parameters and this des not affect them.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +67,71 @@              // TODO rewrite without using quotes
              type T
              val qtp: quoted.Type[T] = tp0.seal.asInstanceOf[quoted.Type[T]]
              given qtp.type = qtp
              '[Seq[T]].unseal.tpe
